title: IMathUtility.CreateTransformRotateAxis
description: Creates a new math transform matrix that represents the rotation by an angle about a vector positioned at a point.
signature:
System.Object CreateTransformRotateAxis( 
   System.Object
PointObjIn
,
   System.Object
VectorObjIn
,
   System.Double
Angle
)

parameters.name: PointObjIn
parameters.description: Center point of the axis of the transform

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle of rotation about the X axis vector

returns: Newly created math transform or null or nothing if the operation fails
